Module it.polimi.demo.ingsw2024pucciruggierisantarossasciarretta
Package it.polimi.demo.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.demo.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
MainControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class MainController extends Object implements MainControllerInterface, Serializable
The MainController class manages game instances and player interactions. It implements the MainControllerInterface and handles game creation, joining, and player actions within the game.
See Also:
